content: Can you tell me the height of the tallest mountain?

Yes, the tallest mountain on Earth is Mount Everest, which stands at an impressive height of 8,848 meters (29,029 feet) above sea level. It's located in the Mahalangur sub-range of the Himalayas, on the border between Nepal and China (Tibet Autonomous Region). Mount Everest is renowned worldwide for its challenging climbs and has attracted mountaineers from around the globe.
